mapper.select: SELECT d.id , s.sw_name , d.nickname , d.reg_date , d.type , d.mac , d.usim , d.pin , d.serial , d.udid FROM device d, software s WHERE d.sw_id = s.id AND user_id = #{id} ORDER BY ${order};

SELECT d.id , s.sw_name , d.nickname , d.reg_date , d.type , d.mac , d.usim , d.pin , d.serial , d.udid FROM device d, software s WHERE d.user_id = #{id} AND s.id = d.sw_id AND sw_id = (SELECT id FROM software WHERE sw_name = #{sw}) ORDER BY ${order};
